cast.name: 梅尔·吉德罗伊茨 Mel Giedroyc
纳迪亚·侯赛因 Nadiya Hussain

this_title: The Great British Bake Off Season 6
trans_title: 英国家庭烘焙大赛 第六季
introduction: The sixth series of The Great British Bake Off first aired on 5 August 2015, with twelve contestants competing to be crowned the series 6 winner. Mel Giedroyc and Sue Perkins present the show, and Mary Berry and Paul Hollywood return as judges. The competition was held in the ground of Welford Park, Berkshire for the second year running.
chinese_title: 英国家庭烘焙大赛 第六季
foreign_title: The Great British Bake Off Season 6
